UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Non-perfectly Amphipathic α-Helical Structure Containing the XXYXX Sequence Improves the Biological Activity of Bovine αs2-Casein Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Gu L, Sun C, Chen L, Pang S, Hussain MA, Jiang C, Ma J, Jiang Z, Hou J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=256 µM,Human endothelial hybrid cells Ea.hy 926:10.01% Killing=256 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi CMCC 50071(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica CMCC 47020(MIC=>128µM),Cronobacter sakazakii ATCC 29544(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26074(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>128µM),Listeria monocytogenes CMCC 54004(MIC=>128µM),Bacillus cereus CMCC 6303(MIC=>128µM)
